name: Credential Dumping by LaZagne
description: Detects LSASS process access by LaZagne for credential dumping.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\lsass.exe AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*C\:\\Windows\\SYSTEM32\\ntdll.dll\+* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*|C\:\\Windows\\System32\\KERNELBASE.dll\+* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*_ctypes.pyd\+* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*python27.dll\+* AND winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:0x1FFFFF)`
